article_text: Two Jackson County legislators have confirmed that the FBI has been asking about a contract between the county and Brittany Burke and her St. Louis public relations firm, Tactas. Burke has said she had an affair with Diehl, the former Missouri House speaker, last year.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Jackson County, consultant, Brittany Burke, John Diehl, FBI

article_summary:
Two Jackson County legislators have confirmed that the FBI has been asking about a contract between the county and Brittany Burke and her St. Louis public relations firm, Tactas.
Burke has said she had an affair with Diehl, the former Missouri House speaker, last year.
